Melanie Cecelia du Bois, bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Arendsvlei, 7de Laan na Sterk Skemer
A mụrụ Du Bois na Riverlea, Johannesburg, South Africa

N'afọ 2016, o kwupụtara na ọ na-alụ ọgụ na nsogbu uche, ọkachasị mgbe ọnwụ nwanne ya nwanyị na ịgba alụkwaghịm ya gasịrị. N'abalị 3 nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2015, nwa nwanne ya nwoke dị afọ iri abụọ na atọ Michael nwụrụ site n'iji T-shirt nke ya kwụgbuo onwe ya
Michael bụ nwa nwanne nwanyị Melanie nke okenye, Lucia Wilson. N'ọnwa Jenụwarị 7, afọ 2015, na-alụ ọgụ na ndị furu efu, Lucia mechara gbuo onwe ya site n'ịkwụgbu onwe ya mgbe ọ dị afọ 46.
Ọ gụsịrị diplọma na mmekọrịta ọha na eze na Technikon Witwatersrand
Mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ọ gụrụ diplọma na Drama site na Trinity College London mechaa mee Associates Teachers Diploma na Drama site n'aka Trinity College London.
N'afọ 2009, ọ sonyeere ndị na-eme ihe nkiri nke SABC2 Afrikaans soapie, 7de Laan
Ọ gara n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nke onye na-emepụta ejiji "Felicity Daniels" afọ 7 n'usoro ruo afọ 2016
N'afọ 2017 ọ rụrụ ọrụ na SABC3 comedy-drama Soap on a Rope ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka "Zee". N'afọ 2018, ọ rụrụ ọrụ "Ronel Foster" na kykNET & kie soap opera Arendsvlei

Ewezuga nke ahụ, ọ kwupụtara na telenovela Doodsondes maka ọrụ "Lal Uzun", nke Tugce Kocak gosipụtara. N'afọ 2013, a họpụtara ya maka Kids Choice Award maka Best Actress ma mesịa họpụta ya maka Tempo Award maka Th Best Actress maka ọrụ ya na 7de Laan
